fields.name: NOTICE_DATE
fields.doc: date and time of notice creation

fields.name: TRIGGER_NUM
fields.doc: string of alpha and digits uniquely identifying event

fields.name: SEG_NUM
fields.doc: Swift serial number (for Swift notice types only)

fields.name: SRC_RA
fields.doc: ra of the pointing direction of the s/c in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: SRC_DEC
fields.doc: dec of the pointing direction of the s/c in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: MAP_DATE
fields.doc: date of GRB/Transient [TJD]Truncated Julian Day when the map was generated

fields.name: MAP_TIME
fields.doc: time of GRB/Transient [SOD]UT seconds-of-day (SOD) when the map was generated

fields.name: TRIGGER_DUR
fields.doc: duration of the sampling interval of the successful trigger criteria.  The value is the number of 4msec ticks, eg a value of 16 indicates a 64-msec trigger criterion.

fields.name: RATE_SIGNIF
fields.doc: significance level of the peak in the FFT image plane [sigma]

fields.name: IMAGE_SIGNIF
fields.doc: significance level of the initial 'rate trigger' [sigma]

fields.name: MAP_URL
fields.doc: full URL of BAT Scaled Map

fields.name: MISC_19
fields.doc: 32 Flag Bits. See https://gcn.gsfc.nasa.gov/sock_pkt_def_doc.html for definition of bits, some bits may not be defined
